column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Flying in an airplane is necessary to travel to far away destinations that are not easily accessible by other modes of transportation .
#id=2
#text=Last summer , I had a girls trip to the Carribean .
#id=3
#text=We had to plan our trip including booking airplane tickets and booking hotels .
#id=4
#text=We booked our airplane tickets online a few months before to get the best fare .
#id=5
#text=We arrive at the airport a few hours beforehand for an international flight .
#id=6
#text=We all pack lightly with one piece of luggage .
#id=7
#text=After waiting at the airport for a while , we boarded our plane .
#id=8
#text=The flight attendants and crew are friendly .
#id=9
#text=We find out seats and try to as comfortable in the cramped seating of a packed flight full of passengers .
#text=We try to relax , buckle up for a four hour flight .
#text=During the four hour flight , we can sleep on watch tv or listen to music .
#text=And the crew will come around with drinks and snacks .
#text=After a necessary flight , we arrive at our destination safely .
